snippet: Ethiopia’s government said its ground forces intended to wipe out bases used by militants it contends have attacked Ethiopian targets and are given sanctuary by Eritrea.
abstract: Ethiopia’s ground forces move into Eritrea, attacking several bases used by militants who the Ethiopian government contends have attacked Ethiopian targets and are given sanctuary by Eritrea.
lead_paragraph: Ethiopia’s government said its ground forces intended to wipe out bases used by militants it contends have attacked Ethiopian targets and are given sanctuary by Eritrea.

headline.main: Ethiopia Hits at Bases Run by Militants in Eritrea
headline.print_headline: Ethiopia Hits At Bases Run By Militants In Eritrea
